name: Strange Night
description: As official of a night security firm, your first night's work may be the last, when strange events test your sanity.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Core 2.3 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1024 MB DirectX: Version 11 Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Core i3 - 3.0 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 2048 MB DirectX: Version 11

reviews.review_text: P.T. Silent Hills vs Five Nights at Freddys. Instead of looping in circles like P.T, you are going back and forth in a house. Make sure you play between 10pm-7am to get the full effect of the game. Got jumpscared a good amount of times. Fun to play while streaming with friends. Pretty good all in all game and worth the price. I give this Indie Horror game an A.
